p: Possible health risks associated with the consumption of A. muricata‐containing food supplements were evaluated based on available published data. Risk assessment was performed following the ‘BfR Guidance Document for Health Assessments’ (BfR, 2010) as well as the EFSA ‘Guidance on Safety assessment of botanicals and botanical preparations intended for use as ingredients in food supplements’ (EFSA, 2009). A detailed monograph on A. muricata was prepared, forming the basis for a publication to be submitted to a peer‐reviewed scientific journal.
